oai_dc:dc.dc:title: An efficient synthesis of furanopyrone and e-isomers and z-isomers of dideoxyl-2-o-cyclohexylidene-alpha-d-xylohepta-5-enofuranose from d-glucose
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: BASKARAN, S
TRIVEDI, GK
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Dicyclohexanone D-glucose has been transformed to furanolactone (6) and E (7) and Z (8) isomers of dideoxyl-2-O-cyclohexylidene-alpha-D-xylohepta-5-enofuranose in an overall yield of 94%.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: INDIAN JOURNAL OF CHEMISTRY SECTION B-ORGANIC CHEMISTRY INCLUDING MEDICINAL CHEMISTRY,33(6)562-564
